page.title: 08HOME LIFE 3
page.content: Aday in the life of Karl Jones (aged 11) continued..... The five hours of my day spent at school. Mon Tues Wed Thurs Fri 9.00 MATHS LANG MATHS LANG LANG 10.15 Read. Read. SWIM Read Read 10.30 ** ASSEMBLY in the school hall* 10.45.*********BREAK TIME************ 11.00 LANG MATHS **** MATH MATHS 12.15 ****** LUNCH ****************** 1.15pmTOPIC CRAFT LANG TOPIC P.E. 2.15 " " TOPIC " ART 2.45 ********** BREAK *************** 3.00 LITERATURE**** LITERATURE******* **Topic includes: history geography, science and religious instruction ** music is always an activity that I do after the visit to the swimming pool on wednesdays. "Games" means sporting activities: football athletics netball cricket.
